name: scrapenstat
description: Web scraping for job posts published in HN. It gets the content from the configured url's and process it to show a statistics graphic

scripts.publish: node-minify --compressor uglify-es --input graphic.js --output docs/graphic.js | node-minify --compressor clean-css --input style.css --output docs/style.css | cp index.html docs/ | cp data/stats.json docs/

author: Juan Sierra
